sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Strong } from 'react-bootstrap'; import products from '../products'; const ProductScreen = () => { const { id: productId } = useParams(); const product = products.find((p) => p._id === productId) console.log(product) return (<> Go Back

{product.name}

 price:SEK{product.price} Price SEK{product.price} Status {product.stock == true ? "" : "Sold Out"} ) } export default ProductScreen
